des:
Before you can connect Alexa with Smartmi smart devices,you need to follow these steps
1. Download "Smartmi Link" app from Google play or App Store
2. Sign up or sign in with your Smartmi account
3. Setup the device with your "Smartmi Link" app, and make sure you can control it in the app
4. Open Alexa app, search "Smartmi Link" skill and enable it by signing in with the same ID you used in "Smartmi Link" app
5. After the setup is finished, you can control the device with alexa.
Devices compatible with alexa:Smartmi Airpurifier P1,Jya Fjord Air Purifier,Jya Fjord Pro Air Purifier,Smartmi Air Circulator Fan
